description: Dr. Subhash Kumar Sinha is one of the most experienced and renowned cardiac specialists, boasting a track record of over 37 years in Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery (CTVS). He has made significant contributions to cardiac surgery as a senior director at Max Super Specialty Hospital, Saket. Dr. Sinha has performed numerous complex heart surgeries, including minimally invasive procedures, aortic aneurysm repairs, and beating heart surgeries. His pioneering work in beating heart surgery has earned him global recognition, and he has trained and mentored 75 medical professionals in surgical procedures and healthcare management throughout his career.
